title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: Currently, the close button and the label are not staying on the same line when the view is resized smaller.
EB: The close button and the label should always stay on the same line, even when the view is resized smaller.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the view.
2. Resize the view to be smaller.
3. Observe that the close button moves down below the label.
